entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:24 a.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
